transcript:
Customer: [Music]

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, R.N. Vakil se baat kar rahe hain, bataiye na.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: R.N. ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan sir, hum baat kar rahe hain, bataiye na. Madena mam.
Executive: Sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hoon, catalog instrument team se.
Customer: Okay mam, aap log baat to karte hain mam, dekhiye koi cheez ka abhi tak mera ₹10 ka profit hua nahi hai. Aur aap log bolte hain customer jo aata hai na, sirf inquiry karne aata hai, lena dena kisi ko nahi hota hai. To bataiye mam, hum paisa investment kiye hain, to humko profit chahiye tabhi na investment kiye. Jitna aapka customer ka phone aata hai, jitne ka hum phone karte hain, sabka sirf kya kehta hai, sirf khali maal ko bolta hai bhaiya ye hai khali inquiry karta hai, leta koi nahi hai. To khali hum inquiry ke liye to nahi baithe hue hain mam.
Hmm.
Customer: To problem hai aapko, aapko kaisa customer ko provided karwa ke dete hain humko samajh nahi aata hai.
Executive: Sir, aapke jo account manager hai Aditya ji, wo aapko itne time se connect kar rahe hain but aapse shayad se baat nahi ho pa rahi hai unki. Wo isiliye hi aapko connect kar rahe the ki agar kuch issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Dekhiye ab dekhiye mera kehna hai ki hum log thoda dhandhe wala aadmi hai, theek hai na? Jahan paisa lagate hain wahan se profit nahi aa raha hai, to hum dhyan nahi dete hain. Aapko pata hai mera ek kaam nahi hai, 10 kaam hai. To apna kaam chhod, jahan se profit aa raha hai, usko thala maar ke isme lag jayenge to dikkat nahi ho jayega. Yahan se profit aaya isme hum try kiye.
Customer: Matlab 10 din, 15 din, ek mahina, do mahina time diye. Dekhe isme profit mera aa hi nahi raha, theek hai na? Aa hi nahi raha. To hum isme dhyan utna nahi de pa rahe hain. Maan lijiye jahan se profit aayega, wahin na aadmi dhyan dega.
Hmm.
Customer: Haan to aap log kya dikha rahe hain? Dekhiye, dekhiye batate hain, hum one time aap log ko investment kar diye, hum log, mera profit nahi nikla, to theek hai na, aaj ke baad se to aap log se kaam karenge hi nahi, wo to baaki ki baat hai. Lekin fir agla jo bhi bolega suggest, agla ko suggest bhi nahi karenge. Aur bolenge ki unse judna hi nahi hai.
Customer: Ki aap log to kaam nikalwa ke dete hain hi nahi, khali payment le lete hain aur chupchap so jate hain. Waisa karte hain to koi fayda hai nahi hum log se kaam karke.
Executive: Sir, aisa to hai nahi ki agar aapne paisa diya hai to hamari side se aapko services ke liye call nahi aaya hoga. Aapko continue.
Customer: Kahan service mila? Kahan service mila? Dekhiye service milta, maan lijiye customer, dekhiye customer khali inquiry karne ke liye, inquiry karne ke liye humko daily 50 aadmi phone karta hai. Ye bhaiya ekwa energy se bol rahe hain? Haan bhaiya ekwa energy se. Humko ye pani chahiye. Haan bhaiya mil jayega. To wo to mera idhar se bhi phone aa jata hai, mera usi mein number diya hua hai, customer ke usi mein humko phone aa jata hai. To hum IndiaMART mein kahan investment kiye humko so bataiye na.
Executive: To sir, us cheez ke liye agar aapko kuch issue tha, kuch tha, to aap Aditya ji se to baat karenge na, wo aapko continue call kar rahe hain.
Customer: Unse baat kiye hain, dekhiye, unse baat kiye hain, dekhiye, char baar, panch baar baat kiye hain, ab mera wahi kaam nahi na rah gaya. Khali phone par baat karein, kaam hoga tabhi na baat karenge.
Executive: Haan, wo to hai sir, lekin services ke liye hi aapko connect kar rahe the.
Executive: To abhi jo lead aapko aa rahi hai.
Customer: Are botal rakh ke usme khada karke usko bhejiye na angle se, humko bhejiye humko.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Kya bole? Hello.
Executive: Abhi aapko lead aa rahi hai aapne.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Haan. Are mam, jo lead aa rahi hai sabse connect kiye hue hain, baat kiye hue hain. Abhi hum 10 din se chhode hue hain. Abhi thoda mera hum log ka dhaan ka season aa gaya, theek hai na? To season mein busy hain hum log. Isliye usko connect nahi kar pa rahe hain, theek hai na? To mera kehna hai wo aapka valid jo aati hai na, so customer nahi rahti hai, beech ka dalal rahti hai, broker.
Customer: Broker sabko lena dena kuch nahi. Bhaiya humko 10,000 ton maal de, wo sabke, wo sab 10 kilo maal abhi tak dekha nahi hai zindagi mein aur maal chahiye tha 10,000 ton. To waisa kaam hota hai kya?
Executive: Okay. To sir, jaise abhi is month aapko 86 inquiries aayi hain, to 86 ki 86.
Customer: Ek minute hold kijiye mam, ek minute, wo customer ki phone aa rahi hai, ek minute.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko...
summary:
Concerns:

- No profit from IndiaMART subscription yet.

- Feels buyleads are just inquiries, not serious buyers.

- Believes IndiaMART is not providing quality customers.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with post-payment service.

- Claims leads are brokers, not genuine customers.



Resolution:

- Executive stated account manager tried connecting.

- Executive mentioned services are provided after payment.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profit, investment, customer service, brokers
